article_title: Politics, over easy, is the order of the day at Attleboro breakfast
article_text:

og.description: ATTLEBORO - There are no state or federal elections this year, but that didn't stop several current and former officials from making their case to voters at the annual Democratic breakfast Saturday at Murray Unitarian Universalist Church.
og.title: Politics, over easy, is the order of the day at Attleboro breakfast
